abstract: Eleven stories about the Turkish migrant experience in Australia. Created as part of 'Enduring stories : migrant memories' at ACMI.
description: Eleven Turkish migrants, from Cyprus and Turkey, tell of their experiences migrating and making Australia their new home. They tell of the reasons for moving here, the journey to Australia and share their feelings for their family, their community and their adopted country.
